ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine heard her cry of pain, he didn t intend to hurt her. There was a good chance she was faking, he knew her internal systems would compensate, but he

Lunarpine heard her cry of pain, he didn't intend to hurt her. There 
was a good chance she was faking, he knew her internal systems would 
compensate, but he had to be sure.

Besides, a wolf never leaves prey injured. Its either dinner or 
escaped.

"Oh don't cry little birdy, it won't hurt very long." he turned back 
towards Shadow Wing, baring his fangs as he spoke. If she was playing 
hurt he was about to find out.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Logo morph" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She was startled when he grabber her talons.  She was caught off 
balance and 
> landed on the ground. "OUCH, ohh, my wing. Oohh."
> as she watched him transform and run off.
> 
> 
> 
> ----Original Message---
> From:   <cyberwolf4@p...>
> Date: Wed Jul 5, 2000 8:20pm
> Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
> 
> 
> 
> Lunarpine wanted the game to last for as long as they could go,he
> thought about letting her win but that wouldn't be a true test. He
> waited until she was close sped up a little and called
> out, "Maximize."The cry wasn't necessary but it fealt proper. A
> battle cry that brought all the different animals in the Maximal 
army
> together. The wolf became bot again, turned and grabbed her talons,
> pulling her down. "Lesson one, make your prey come to your
> strengths." With those last words Lunarpine transformed back to wolf
> and started in the other direction."By the way, you're still it."
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
